title: Cultural Competency Training Workshop for Enhancing Awareness of Healthcare Disparities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Understanding of Social Inequality Concepts
context.additional_context: Creating immersive learning environments through case analyses of patients with diverse cultural backgrounds.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three major causes and examples of healthcare disparities.
Learners can demonstrate patient communication strategies that consider cultural differences through role-playing scenarios.
Learners can propose two or more community-level action plans to address health inequalities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
